attributes.action: Petition against holding a further referendum on leaving EU
attributes.additional_details:
With elections and referendums you do not keep having second and third goes until you get the result you want... You have one chance and that is it.

The petition for a further referendum has gained sufficient signatures to be debated therefore I feel it only correct that there should be a counter petition to this...please sign to support this petition in just the same way when you turned out to vote Leave
attributes.background:
On the 23/06/2016 The United Kingdom held a national referendum to decide whether to leave or remain in the EU. The leave campaign won and the history of our great nation took a new route. 

A petition has been raised by the losing remain camp to have a second referendum because they lost.

.
